eu_initiatives: All those initiatives and policies relating to financial services companies , whether incorporated in an EU jurisdiction or relevant to an institution incorporated or headquartered in Japan providing financial services into the EU
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
belgium_office_address: Mizuho Bank Europe NV Brussels Branch Avenue Louise 480
membership: MHFG and its subsidiaries are members of various trade associations relating to financial services in different jurisdictions , the principal such association being the Japanese Bankers association
goals__remit: Mizuho Financial Group Inc is the holding company of a financial services group that together with its subsidiaries and affiliates provides banking , trust banking , securities and other financial services . Headquartered in Japan , the group and its constituent entities has over five hundred branches in Japan and over 80 offices outside of Japan.
